Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='JWC79')

BibliographicData.Title: Different thalamic relationships of sensory-motor and parietal cortical fields in monkeys

Animals.Comments: Also squirrel monkeys are used in this study; these data is not collected.
